definitions.definition: ( biblical ) First son of Jacob , by his wife Leah .
A male given name from Hebrew .
A surname transferred from the given name
( Oxford University , informal ) Ellipsis of Reuben College, Oxford .

main_definition: ( biblical ) First son of Jacob , by his wife Leah .
secondary_definitions: A male given name from Hebrew .
A surname transferred from the given name
( Oxford University , informal ) Ellipsis of Reuben College, Oxford .

definitions.definition: A grilled or toasted sandwich made with corned beef , sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and either Russian dressing or Thousand Island dressing .
A member of one of the Israelite tribes , descended from Reuben.

main_definition: A grilled or toasted sandwich made with corned beef , sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and either Russian dressing or Thousand Island dressing .
